DOC.brief_summary: The embryo transfer imply transportation incubator 37 ° C , transfer catheter inside laminar flow hood whose work surface also maintain 37 ° C. . From laboratory operate room embryo expose temperature drop , consequently thermal stress occurs , may compromise future viability . The aim study ass possible improvement clinical result embryos transport stable device avoid drop temperature throughout transfer process . With use thermosetting device heat 37 ° C , researcher expect 15 % increase pregnancy rate .
DOC.brief_title: New Device Maintain Embryo Temperature During Transfer
